Fabric Developer – Jersey

Job Context

Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) is a multinational apparel buying hub and exporter. The organization is marching ahead with a vision to deliver world-class service, quality solutions and value-added services to end products for the textile industries. DSL is committed to achieve global level, beginning from fabrics to fashion through market knowledge and experienced sourcing professionals. Global headquarter of Dongyi sourcing is located at North Point, Hong Kong and Global corporate office is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Dongyi Sourcing Ltd is searching potential candidates for Fabric Developer – Jersey position.

 

Job Responsibilities

  1. Design and develop new jersey fabrics according to the company’s requirements.

  2. Innovate and experiment with yarns, knitting techniques, and finishes to create unique fabrics.

  3. Ensure the fabrics meet the specified performance standards (e.g., stretch, recovery, drape).

  4. Conduct market research to stay updated on the latest trends in jersey fabrics.

  5. Analyze competitor products and consumer preferences to guide fabric development.

  6. Attend trade shows and exhibitions to gather insights and inspiration.

  7. Work closely with designers to understand their vision and translate it into fabric designs.

  8. Liaise with suppliers and manufacturers to source materials and ensure the feasibility of fabric production.

  9. Collaborate with the production team to ensure seamless integration of new fabrics into the manufacturing process.

  10. Develop and implement testing protocols to ensure fabric quality and durability.

  11. Address any quality issues that arise during the development or production phases.

  12. Maintain detailed records of fabric specifications, test results, and production notes.

  13. Create and maintain technical documentation for all developed fabrics, including specifications, test reports, and production guidelines.

  14. Prepare reports and presentations for internal stakeholders to showcase new fabric developments and trends.

Employment Status

  • Full-time

Educational Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in Fashion Design, Textile Engineering, or a related field. 

Experience Requirements

  • Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in product development, preferably in sportswear or apparel.

  • Strong knowledge of fabric properties, garment construction, and manufacturing processes.

  • Proficiency in design software (e.g., Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop) and technical design tools.

    RMG, Multinational Buying office, Trading office.

Additional Requirements

  • Age limit 35 years

  • Must be fluent in English writing and speaking.

  • Must have advance skill on MS Excel, MS Word & MS Power Point.

Job Location

Dhaka (Uttara)

Salary

Negotiable

Compensation & Other Benefits

  • Mobile bill

  • Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize

  • Salary Review: Yearly

  • Festival Bonus: 2

  • Performance bonus

  • On-time salary – Current month’s salary is paid in current monthly only (last working day of each month)

  • Health Insurance

  • Medical Insurance

  • Long-term benefits

  • PF

If you are passionate to good fit for the position please send your updated CV to

career@dongyi.hk

by 14th July 2024

Note: Please Mention the Position Name in Email Subject.
